title: A Normal Anime Thread But Instead of Lewds it's Nyarko-San
body:
https://i.imgur.com/LIKkQ8a.png

https://i.imgur.com/v82O5Zp.gif
https://i.imgur.com/PBwaRn6.gif

Sometimes you just need a stupid self aware show about Lovecraftian horrors being mostly cute anime girls that sometimes beat things to death with crowbars. There is nothing more that needs to be said, because Nyarko-san is adorable and perfect.

https://youtu.be/XscnNkfDhbA

https://i.imgur.com/fbi60mB.gif
https://i.imgur.com/T7t8Bnl.gif
